meaningMnemonic: A <radical>gold</radical> man has one <radical>mustache</radical> above his lip and one <radical>mustache</radical> below his lip and keeps all his extra mustaches safely tucked away in a <kanji>pot</kanji>. This man is made of gold and has a lot of money. That’s how he can afford to groom two mustaches at the same time. If anything should happen to one, he has plenty of back up mustaches in his mustache storage pot.
readingMnemonic: The mustachioed man’s wife asks if he loves his <kanji>pot</kanji> of mustaches more than he loves her. “<reading>Nah ba</reading>be (なべ),” he says. “Nah, babe. Nah.”
